org.jgentleframework.context.beans
Interface Initializing

All Known Implementing Classes:
RmiBinderImpl, RmiExporterImpl, RmiExporterProxyFactoryBean
public interface Initializing

Interface to be implemented by beans that need to react once all their properties have been set by a : for example, to perform custom initialization, or merely to check that all mandatory properties have been set.

An alternative to implementing InitializingBean is specifying a custom init-method.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
DisposableMethod, InitializingMethod

Method Summary
 void afterBeanCreated()
          Invoked by the container after it has set all bean properties supplied (and satisfied ProviderAware and DefinitionAware).
 

Method Detail

afterBeanCreated

void afterBeanCreated()
Invoked by the container after it has set all bean properties supplied (and satisfied ProviderAware and DefinitionAware). This method allows the bean instance to perform initialization only possible when all bean properties have been set.
